projects.name: Cover Swift: Frontend Development
projects.description: A responsive landing page emphasizing insurance services built with Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: QadaSolat: Compensating for Missed Salah Throughout One's Lifetime
projects.description: Qadasolat is designed to help Muslims keep track of missed prayers (qada solat) and make up for them.

projects.name: FYP: Crime Reporting System
projects.description: Crime reporting system allows users to lodge police report without having to go to the police station and view crime density as geospatial data using Leaflet interactive map.
